Title: Shiawase Pasta Story
Description: ['A collaboration campaign between ', Kraft Parmesan Cheese, ' and ', World Masterpiece Theater, '. Eight web shorts were made using seven of the ', World Masterpiece Theater, ' stories (Flanders no Inu had two episodes); they act as mini side-stories within their respective shows, though ', Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri, ' occurs after the show.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' An apprentice fairy called Palme connects all the stories together as she uses her magic (aka sprinkling parmesan) to make "happy pasta."']
Related: ['Adaptation: Bernard-jou Iwaku.', 'Sequel: Bernard-jou Iwaku.: Ofuro Dokusho']
